item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 30 Jan 2024
item.description:
1. Prefaculty/postdoc research position at Jane Street (New York or London)
  2. Vg 9.5.0 ‚Äì Declarative 2D vector graphics
  3. OCaml Platform Newsletter: November and December 2023
  4. Upcoming Caqti Release - TLS, Packaging, and minor breakage
  5. Developing Web and mobile applications in OCaml
  6. dream-html 2.0.0
  7. Discussions on the future of the opam repository
  8. Request for Feedback: Take the OCaml.org Learn Area User Satisfaction Survey
  9. Middleware 1.0.0 -- Composable functions which respond to inner calls
  10. Announcing validate 1.0.0 - Enhanced Data Validation in OCaml!
  11. Congratulation to the OCaml team for the 2023 SIGPLAN programming languages software award! üèÜ
  12. Participate in OCaml.org Learn Area User Testing
  13. Other OCaml News
